blog.name: dangirlphillie
blog.title: I'm Sorry I'm so 2009
blog.description: Bryce || bisexual and demisexual || she/her|| 23|| phandom trash || dangirlphillie on ao3

body:
Alternative Fandoms

It seems like most of the phandom has moved on to kpop or druk, and I’m the little weirdo who got really into goblincore, Taylor swift, and Bbc sherlock. So for other weirdos out there I’ve made a list of other fandoms you can obsess over during this hiatus and/or beyond.

1. Merlin? I’ve heard it’s gay.

2. Self care fandom, bitch we need it

3. Cottagecore, goblincore, clowncore. It will make you feel Soft Emotions.

4. Jenna and Julien JENNA AND JULIEN.

5. Drew Gooden and/or Danny Gonzalez. You want self aware ex vine stars? I’ll give you self aware ex vine stars.

6. All those video essays from leftist philosophers on YouTube, it’s like listening to John green but on steroids and you’ll feel like a genius god after.

7. Does yoga have a fandom?

8. Disney Parks and other theme park fandoms. There are entire subcultures about the history and adaptation of parks. I know stupid facts about universals renovations in the early 2000s and I hate Michael Eisner more than I should now. Watch Jenny Nicholson and Yesterworld.

9. I’ve heard Skam or scam or something is cool??? idk???

10. Lets bring superwholock back folks, we can do it.

Also in the meantime, I personally am protesting dnp’s merch and videos until they give us an explanation. Breaks are fine, completely ignoring your loyal fanbase is not. It might not be the most effective message to send, but it is a message. Enjoy your other fandoms and when they come back, we will hear about it.

summary:
i’m sorry this blog is so inactive lol
still love dnp but haven’t been as into them during this hiatus but i’m sure i’ll be...
body:
i’m sorry this blog is so inactive lol

still love dnp but haven’t been as into them during this hiatus but i’m sure i’ll be revived when they inevitably return (possibly moved into a new home?? i like to be optimistic)

if you want some pretty ~aesthetics~ during this drought you can follow my main blog @sunshouwers
